Name: ManyPI
Tagline: Turn websites into APIs
Description: Convert any website into a clean, type-safe API. Use natural-language or JSON-schema prompts to extract data and get usable JSON output for RAG pipelines, sales, content aggregation, or research.

Name: Google GenTabs in Disco
Tagline: Remix your tabs into custom apps tailored uniquely to you!
Description: GenTabs in Disco is Google Lab's newest experiment. GenTabs uses Gemini 3, turns messy browsing into custom mini-apps. It understands your open tabs and tasks, remixes them to generate interactive, personalized web applications that help you plan, learn, and create without writing a line of code.

Name: Unloop
Tagline: Visual pattern mapping for adhd & neurodivergent minds
Description: Unloop is a visual pattern mapping tool that helps you see the triggers, thoughts, emotions, and behaviors that keep you stuck. Map it out. Spot the loop. Let AI surface what you missed. Design tiny experiments to interrupt it. No prescriptions. No generic advice. Just your patterns, made visible.

Name: Lyra Chrome Extension
Tagline: Automated pre-meeting research in Google Calendar.
Description: Lyra automates pre-meeting research directly inside Google Calendar. Stop frantically Googling 5 minutes before the call. Lyra's live agents scour the web in real-time to give you the context and sources you need.

Name: BetterWrite
Tagline: Minimalist writing editor with vim mode
Topics: Open Source, Writing, User Experience, GitHub
Description: BetterWrite offers a beautiful, distraction-free writing environment designed for those who value simplicity and focus. With Vim keybindings, users can enjoy a familiar and efficient editing experience. The editor supports multiple fonts and includes a dark mode for comfortable writing in low-light conditions.

Name: Syllaby V3.0
Tagline: Syllaby: Create, Edit, Publish—All in One
Topics: SaaS, Artificial Intelligence, Social media marketing
Description: Syllaby is your all-in-one AI studio for viral video creation. Instantly turn ideas into faceless or cinematic content with trending topics, ready-to-film scripts, and studio-quality visuals. From planning to publishing, Syllaby streamlines every step—so your content stays consistent, professional, and unmistakably yours.

Name: Justblank - The Complete AEO Hub
Tagline: Free AEO analytics with content tools to boost AI rankings
Description: Justblank is a full-cycle AEO platform built for the AI search era. Start with free AEO analytics to see how AI engines understand and rank your brand inside AI answers. Track prompt visibility, competitor mentions, and prompt volume across leading LLMs. Turn insights into action by creating and optimizing AEO-ready content to increase visibility in AI-generated answers, all in one place.

Name: RSTGameTranslation
Tagline: Real-time screen translator for any game
Description: RSTGameTranslation is an open-source tool that helps gamers play titles without localization. It captures text from the game screen in real-time, performs OCR, and translates it (Using AI for translation) into your desired language instantly. Perfect for playing Japanese or Chinese exclusive

Name: Foretoken AI
Tagline: AI-native engineer hiring via real-work simulations
Description: Foretoken AI replaces LeetCode and AI-banned tests with realistic work simulations. Candidates complete short, practical projects such as debugging a repo or building a web app using the tools they prefer, including AI. Foretoken evaluates not just the final results, but also candidates’ thinking, communication, decision-making, and use of AI. The result is work-trial-level hiring signal in hours instead of weeks, at a fraction of the cost and aligned with how top engineers work today.

Name: Recaply
Tagline: Transform voice memos into actionable notes
Description: Turn your voice memos into structured notes with AI-powered transcription and intelligent summarization. Perfect for professionals, students, and content creators.

Name: Tpylo
Tagline: Keep 95% of your revenue.
Description: Support creators directly without platform fees eating 30%+ of their income. Tpylo lets fans donate, subscribe to tiers, buy digital products, and chat with creators all while creators keep 95% of what they earn. Built for the creator economy, designed for direct relationships.

Name: Little Answers
Tagline: Help parents explain the world, one question at a time
Description: Kids ask big questions. Adults don’t always have big answers ready. Little Answers helps parents, caregivers, and teachers explain complex topics to children in simple, warm, age-appropriate language. Ask a question in any language, pick an age range, and choose a style: - Story: gentle, imaginative explanations - Gentle: short and calming - Curious: a bit deeper Every answer stays respectful and easy to say out loud. No accounts. No feeds. No noise. Just help explaining the world together.

Name: Wauld
Tagline: Design • Issue • Track - Digital Certificates and Badges
Description: Wauld is an end-to-end digital credential platform that lets you design, issue, and track verifiable certificates and badges in minutes. No more juggling between multiple tools, fragmented data, and manual verification. With 600+ templates, tamper-proof security, and real-time tracking (including LinkedIn), you get the complete credentialing lifecycle in one place. Free for up to 300 credentials. Ideal for online coaches, trainers, educators, community owners, and HR teams.

Name: Liqoria
Tagline: Music for Mac
Description: Liqoria is a Liquid Glass music app for Mac that unifies Apple Music, Spotify, YouTube and more into one seamless player. Search, like songs, control playback, view animated artwork on lock screen, and enjoy a fluid Mac music experience across all your services

Name: Bill Mate
Tagline: Al Bills Splitter
Description: Bill Mate makes splitting bills with friends and family simple and accurate. Just scan your receipt, and our Al automatically extracts all the details-then assign items to people and let Bill Mate calculate who owes what, including taxes and tips. Perfect for splitting restaurant bills with friends!

Name: Knowledge Painter
Tagline: Visualize the knowledge in your textbooks
Description: Have you imagined making the knowledge in textbooks come alive? With just one sentence, Knowledge Painter can generate personalized knowledge videos, animations, or web applications tailored to you, and you can engage with them directly.

Name: Memoir
Tagline: Turn your memories into a living story
Description: Just talk. Share your stories, experiences, and memories through natural conversation. Our AI transforms your words into a beautiful memoir you can treasure forever.

Name: Crowdstake AI Society
Tagline: 1,000 AI customers tell you how to improve your website
Description: Paste your URL and instantly get a full analysis of how your website is perceived, specific recommendations to increase conversions, deep understanding of who your ideal customers are, and competitor analysis to see where you can stand out. All the insights you'd get from expensive traffic—without spending a dime.

Name: FindEmails.ai
Tagline: Find emails that actually work.
Description: Find any business email address instantly with FindEmails.ai. Smart email pattern detection and verification for sales and marketing teams. Integrate with your CRM and verify the deliverability of every email in your system.

Name: Pounce
Tagline: The Bloomberg Terminal for Domain Investors.
Description: Stop digging through spam. Pounce is a domain intelligence platform that filters 99% of junk auctions from GoDaddy & Sedo automatically. Monitor drops, track renewal prices, and find undervalued assets in real-time. Built for hunters, not hoarters.
